title: FS: T206 O'Hara, Demmitt, & Mathewson  All Sold Thanks
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS: T206 O'Hara, Demmitt, & Mathewson  All Sold Thanks
posts.post_content:
Hi all, I'm looking to sell some tough T206. I accept  PayPal  for  these.  Prices are net to me, so please add 3%  for regular  PayPal. Domestic shipping is on me, shipping to other countries, I will work with you on price.  Scans available on  request.

Demmitt, St. Louis, Polar Bear, obvious writing on front, still a great looking card, PSA 3 (MK)- $[strike]1100[/strike] sold

O'Hara, St. Louis, Polar Bear, really nice example, SGC 40- $[strike]2150[/strike] $[strike]2000[/strike] sold

Mathewson Dark Cap, really pretty for the grade, this card really pops, PSA 2- $[strike]350[/strike] sold

PM, or e-mail with questions or offers ( [URL="skeltone@rocketmail.com"]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/URL]  ). A firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing  negotiations.  Thanks for looking.
Email sent on Matty. I'll take it if available. Thank you
